alert.note: Alert for Moore (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 22 at 6:42PM CST until February 24 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CST FOR CENTRAL MOORE AND LINCOLN COUNTIES... At 641 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fayetteville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Lynchburg, Tims Ford Lake, Mulberry, Howell, Belleville, Dellrose, Hurdlow, Belleview and Lois. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for north central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
